idea:
Mymealplanned is a web application that automates a 30-60-90 day meal plan for the members, basis their personal health profile, taste preferences, and dietary concerns.


The platform aims at promoting Meal Planning, an affordable choice for all families in India, with a long-term vision of tracking the impact of food on our health and proactively preventing the negative impacts of unconscious and unhealthy food choices on our health.


We aim at bridging the gap between what we eat and what our body needs to stay healthy naturally.
name: UNDERSTANDING PLANET NEEDS PRIVATE LIMITED
